Toothbrush with built-in tongue cleaner: This toothbrush would have a small brush on the back that would clean the tongue, removing bacteria and freshening breath.

Toothbrush with pressure sensors: This toothbrush would have sensors that detect the pressure applied while brushing, ensuring that the user is brushing correctly and avoiding too much pressure on the gums.

Toothbrush with UV sterilization: This toothbrush would have a UV light that would kill all the bacteria on the bristles after each use, making it a safer option for people with weakened immune systems.
Toothbrush with a built-in floss holder: This toothbrush would have a small holder attached to the handle that would hold floss, making it easy to floss without having to hold the floss separately.

Toothbrush with a built-in timer: This toothbrush would have a timer that would remind the user to brush for the recommended two minutes, ensuring that they brush long enough to effectively remove plaque and prevent cavities.
